subject: Hockey, Ice
Olympic Games (2014)
Snowboarding
Figure Skating
Skiing
Curling
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn’s injury may mean athletes like the snowboarder Shaun White, the skier Ted Ligety, the figure skater Kim Yu-na and the curler Brad Jacobs will see more of the spotlight.
snippet: Lindsey Vonn’s injury may mean athletes like the snowboarder Shaun White, the skier Ted Ligety, the figure skater Kim Yu-na and the curler Brad Jacobs will see more of the spotlight.
